template <typename Block, dimension_type D>
class vsip::impl::Sliced_block
File: ../../../vsip/core/subblock.hpp

The Sliced_block class binds one of the indices of the underlying N-dimensional block to a constant, producing an N-1-dimensional block. N must be 2 or 3, and the index chosen must be allowed for the underlying block.

Specializations:
Sliced_block<Block,0>
Sliced_block<Block,1>
Sliced_block<Block,2>
